channel.title: I need client help
channel.description:
hello,
how might I change the color of the clients loading bar and login bar, anyone know? would be very much appreciated

item.title: I need client help
item.dc:creator: @p0ks p0ks
item.description:
@p0ks wrote:

Change the color of login bar in menu class

public static final int COLOUR_BOX_GRADIENT_TOP = 0x0099CC;
public static final int COLOUR_BOX_GRADIENT_BOTTOM = 0x0099CC;
public static final int COLOUR_BOX_BORDER1 = 0x0099CC;
public static final int COLOUR_BOX_BORDER2 = 0x0099CC;

http://www.nthelp.com/colorcodes.htm < color codes

Read full topic

item.title: I need client help
item.dc:creator: @Enth Enth
item.description:
@Enth wrote:

I’ve seen tutorial of it somewhere in Mopar…

but what source are you using? Atleast on Noobscape loading bar’s color can be changed in GameWindow (located: Client\src\org\rscdaemon\client)

Search for:
public static final Color BAR_COLOUR = new Color(0, 0, 255);

“0, 0, 255” is the color that you wanna change. I don’t know other colors than 255, 0, 0 is for red. Maybe someone else can help you with other colors and with client button change

Read full topic
